name: MERCADONA SA
bossPosition: Directora Relaciones Externas Portugal y Asuntos Europeos
membership: Mercadona is a mermber of EuroCommerce and ERRT and via CEOE participates in Business Europe.
goal: Mercadona is a Spanish  family-owned supermarket company whose objective since its foundation has been to fully satisfy all the food and beverages, cleaning and personal hygiene needs of its customers. As well as those related to the pet care.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- B2B (unfair trading practices)
- E-commerce
- Internal market
- Enviroment/CSR
- Food Safety
- Payments
- Taxation
- International Trade
- Agriculture
